options.-r, --recursive: Remove directories and their contents recursively.
options.-f, --force: Ignore nonexistent files and arguments, never prompt.

options.status: Shows status of Pending Changes (Not implemented yet)
options.pull: Pulls Latest Commit from remote repository
options.push: Pushes Latest Commit to remote repository

name: curl
description: Allows you to fetch a script from the internet and run it or save it to the fs

options.-j, --jsh: Launch the WebContainer JavaScript shell (jsh) instead of Node.js. When this flag is used, no other arguments are passed to the shell.
options.-c, --check: Check the script's syntax without executing it. Exits with an error code if script is invalid.
options.-h, --help: Print command-line options. The output of this option is less detailed than this document.
options.-i, --interactive: Open the REPL even if stdin does not appear to be a terminal.
options.-p, --print string: Identical to -e, but prints the result.
options.-r, --require module: Preload the specified module at startup. Follows require() module resolution rules.
options.--abort-on-uncaught-exception: Aborting instead of exiting causes a core file to be generated for post-mortem analysis using a debugger (such as lldb, gdb, and mdb).
options.--cpu-prof: Start the V8 CPU profiler on start up, and write the CPU profile to disk before exit.
options.--diagnostic-dir=directory: Set the directory to which all diagnostic output files are written. Defaults to current working directory.
options.--disable-warning=code-or-type: Silence specific process warnings by code or type.
options.--dns-result-order=order: Set the default value of order in dns.lookup() and dnsPromises.lookup(). The value could be: ipv4first, ipv6first, verbatim.
options.--enable-fips: Enable FIPS-compliant crypto at startup. (Requires Node.js to be built against FIPS-compatible OpenSSL.)
options.--enable-source-maps: Enable Source Map v3 support for stack traces.
options.--experimental-default-type=type: Set the default module system to use.
options.--experimental-import-meta-resolve: Enable experimental import.meta.resolve() parent URL support.
options.--experimental-loader=module: Use the specified module as a custom loader.
options.--experimental-sea-config: Use this flag to generate a blob that can be injected into the Node.js binary to produce a single executable application.
options.--force-context-aware: Disable loading native addons that are not context-aware.
options.--frozen-intrinsics: Enable experimental frozen intrinsics like Array and Object.
options.--heap-prof: Start the V8 heap profiler on start up, and write the heap profile to disk before exit.
options.--icu-data-dir=file: Specify ICU data load path. (Overrides NODE_ICU_DATA.)
options.--input-type=type: Set the module type for string input via --eval, --print, or STDIN.
options.--inspect[=[host:]port]: Activate inspector on host:port. Default is 127.0.0.1:9229.
options.--inspect-brk[=[host:]port]: Activate inspector on host:port and break at start of user script.
options.--inspect-wait[=[host:]port]: Activate inspector on host:port and wait for debugger to be attached.
options.--jitless: Disable runtime allocation of executable memory.
options.--max-http-header-size=size: Specify the maximum size of HTTP headers in bytes. Defaults to 16KiB.
options.--napi-modules: This option is a no-op. It is kept for compatibility.
options.--no-experimental-global-customevent: Disable exposing CustomEvent on the global scope.
options.--no-experimental-global-webcrypto: Disable experimental Web Crypto API on the global scope.
options.--no-experimental-repl-await: Disable top-level await keyword support in REPL.
options.--no-extra-info-on-fatal-exception: Hide extra information on fatal exception that causes exit.
options.--openssl-config=file: Load an OpenSSL configuration file on startup.
options.--openssl-shared-config: Enable OpenSSL default configuration section, openssl_conf to be read from the OpenSSL configuration file.
options.--preserve-symlinks-main: Follow symlinks when resolving the main module.
options.--redirect-warnings=file: Write process warnings to the given file instead of printing to stderr.
options.--report-compact: Write reports in a compact format, single-line JSON.
options.--report-dir=directory: Directory where the report is written.
options.--report-filename=filename: Name of the file to which the report will be written.
options.--report-on-fatalerror: Generate a report on fatal errors.
options.--report-on-signal: Generate a report upon receiving a signal.
options.--report-signal=signal: Set the signal upon which a report is generated.
options.--report-uncaught-exception: Generate a report on uncaught exceptions.
options.--secure-heap=n: Initialize an OpenSSL secure heap of n bytes.
options.--secure-heap-min=n: Minimum allocation from the OpenSSL secure heap.
options.--test: Starts the Node.js command line test runner.
options.--test-concurrency: Set the number of test files to run in parallel.
options.--test-name-pattern: Run tests whose name matches the provided pattern.
options.--tls-cipher-list=list: Specify an alternative default TLS cipher list.
options.--tls-keylog=file: Log TLS key material to a file.
options.--trace-atomics-wait: Print short summaries of calls to Atomics.wait().
options.--trace-event-categories categories: A comma separated list of categories that should be traced when trace event tracing is enabled.
options.--trace-event-file-pattern pattern: Template string specifying the filepath for the trace event data.
options.--trace-events-enabled: Enable the collection of trace event tracing information.
options.--trace-exit: Print a stack trace whenever an environment is exited proactively.
options.--trace-sync-io: Print a stack trace whenever synchronous I/O is detected after the first turn of the event loop.
options.--trace-tls: Print TLS packet trace information to stderr.
options.--trace-uncaught: Print stack traces for uncaught exceptions.
options.--trace-warnings: Print stack traces for process warnings (including deprecations).
options.--track-heap-objects: Track heap object allocations for heap snapshots.
options.--unhandled-rejections=mode: Define the behavior for unhandled rejections. Mode can be one of: throw, strict, warn, warn-with-error-code, none.
options.--use-bundled-ca: Use bundled Mozilla CA store as supplied by current Node.js version.
options.--use-largepages=mode: Re-map the Node.js static code to large memory pages at startup.
options.--watch: Restart the process when the command is edited.
options.--watch-preserve-output: Disable clearing the console when watch mode restarts the process.
options.--zero-fill-buffers: Automatically zero-fills all newly allocated Buffer and SlowBuffer instances.
options.--allow-child-process: Allow spawning process when using the permission model.
options.--allow-fs-read: Allow file system read access when using the permission model.
options.--allow-fs-write: Allow file system write access when using the permission model.
options.--allow-wasi: Allow WASI when using the permission model.
options.--allow-worker: Allow creating worker threads when using the permission model.

name: ping
description: Allows you to ping a site

name: cat
description: Display the contents of a file

name: tb
description: Command for debugging terbium and interacting directly with it's API's

name: unzip
description: unzip a file to a directory
